 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֱדַ֫יִן‎</span><sub>57</sub> **adverb** ==then, thereupon== (so Egyptian Aramaic [[BDB#S-C|S-C]]<sup>Pap. H 1, J 1</sup>), not [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]]: the usually Aramaic forms are <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הֵידֵין‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Mandean <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎האידין‎</span> ([[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M 207</sup>); from [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֱדַי‎</span>] = Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲזַי‎</span> (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָז‎</span>) + determ. affix ***n*** (as in <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דִּכֵּן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תַּמָּן‎</span>; in Sabean = post-positive article; [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chr. § 57:</sup> compare [[BDB#W|W]]<sup>CG 115</sup>), [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>GGA 1884, 1020:</sup> <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֲזַי‎</span>, [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֱדַי‎</span>], probably from same demonstrative √ as <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎זֶה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דָּא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דִּי‎</span>, etc., <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***lo*** <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***well then, in that case***, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: ***when***? <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: ***now*** ([[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>Lex. 197, 1072</sup>), Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (enclitic) ***but***); — ***then, thereupon***, [[Dan.2.15|Dan 2:15]]; [[Dan.2.17|Dan 2:17]]; [[Dan.2.19|Dan 2:19]]; [[Dan.2.25|Dan 2:25]]; [[Dan.2.48|Dan 2:48]]; [[Dan.3.24|Dan 3:24]] +, [[Ezra.4.9|Ezra 4:9]]; [[Ezra.4.23|Ezra 4:23]]; [[Ezra.5.4|Ezra 5:4]]; [[Ezra.5.9|Ezra 5:9]] + (always, except [[Ezra.5.5|Ezra 5:5]], at beginning of sentence, introducing new stage of narrative with some emphasis); so with <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בֵּאדַיִן‎</span> (3 t. Ezra, 26 t. Daniel) [[Dan.2.14|Dan 2:14]]; [[Dan.2.35|Dan 2:35]]; [[Dan.2.46|Dan 2:46]]; [[Dan.3.3|Dan 3:3]]; [[Dan.3.13|Dan 3:13]]; [[Dan.3.19|Dan 3:19]]; [[Dan.3.21|Dan 3:21]] (twice in verse); [[Dan.3.26|Dan 3:26]], etc., [[Ezra.4.24|Ezra 4:24]]; [[Ezra.5.2|Ezra 5:2]]; [[Ezra.6.1|Ezra 6:1]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מִןאֱֿדַיִן‎</span> ***from that time*** [[Ezra.5.16|Ezra 5:16]].
